content: this sprouts shawl is a lovely lightweight accessory to have on hand when a chill is in the air this project involves a square motif that is worked using breakaway crochet techniques this means that all squares are worked continuously and jayg - so no sewing and no yarn tails when joined together the square motif makes a very interesting visual effect appearing almost as an all-over stitch each square includes 3 types of picots that resemble little sprouts that are just emerging in a new garden hence the name shawl measures 50 x 16 127cm x 40cm it is very easy to modify the size of the shawl and you will need 2 balls of holst garn coast but if you want to make the shawl bigger then it s a good idea to have 3 balls on hand video tutorial demonstrating the special techniques used is available on youtube here 1 1 https //youtu be/uvj1lsl-plm si=hk4gvfrvgdgtop-x
